sentence: As a result, Tim Hutchison was exposed to Grizzards unique humor and perspective, which introduced him to the greatest college football player of the day, Herschel Walker.
author: Chip Towers
title: From far and wide, Georgia fans flock to Indianapolis

sentence: Or perhaps McConnell might have been referring to Herschel Walker, the Republican running for Georgias Senate seat whom McConnell himself has endorsed.
title: Opinion: After appealing to con men, the GOP now complains about the hucksters
